          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kert és balkonkert</string>
            <string language="en-US">Garden And Balcony Garden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Garten Und Balkon-Garten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jardin et Jardin de Balcon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jardim E Jardim Do Balcão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giardino E Giardino Del Balcone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κήπος και κήπος μπαλκονιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jardín Y Jardín Del Balcón</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A kertek típusai - díszkert, játszókert, haszonkert; A haszonkertek növényei, a biokertészet; a balkonláda növényei; madarak a kertben, madáretető telepítése; ültetés a kertben</string>
            <string language="en-US">Types of Gardens - Flower Garden, Playing Garden, Cultivation Garden; Plants of Cultivation Gardens, Bio-gardening, Plants of Balcony Box; Birds in the Garden, Placing aBird Feeder, Planting in the Garde</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">egészséges életmódra nevelés</string>
            <string language="en-US">healhty lifestyle education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lakás</string>
            <string language="en-US">flat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lakóhely</string>
            <string language="en-US">residence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lakókörnyezet</string>
            <string language="en-US">surroundings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kert</string>
            <string language="en-US">garden</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der Gärten - Blume-Garten, Garten, 
Bearbeitung-Garten spielend; Betriebe der Bearbeitung-Gärten, 
Bio-arbeitend, Betriebe des Balkon-Kastens im Garten; Vögel im 
Garten, die aBird Zufuhr legend und errichten in das Garde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de jardins - jardin de fleur, jouant le 
jardin, jardin de culture ; Usines des jardins de culture, 
Bio-jardinage, usines de cadre de balcon ; Oiseaux dans le 
jardin, plaçant le conducteur d'aBird, plantant dans le Garde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de jardins - jardim da flor, jogando o 
jardim, jardim do cultivation; Plantas de jardins do 
cultivation, Bio-jardinando, plantas da caixa do balcão; 
Pássaros no jardim, colocando o alimentador do aBird, plantando
no Garde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di giardini - giardino del fiore, giocanti 
giardino, giardino di coltura; Piante dei giardini di coltura, 
Bio--facenti il giardinaggio, piante della casella del balcone; 
Uccelli nel giardino, disponendo l'alimentatore di aBird, 
piantante nel Garde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι κήπων - κήπος λουλουδιών, κήπος παιχνιδιού, 
κήπος καλλιέργειας  Εγκαταστάσεις των κήπων καλλιέργειας, 
βιο-κηπουρική, εγκαταστάσεις του κιβωτίου μπαλκονιών  
Πουλιά στον κήπο, τοποθετώντας τον τροφοδότη aBird, που 
φυτεύει garde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tipos de jardines - jardín de la flor, jugando 
el jardín, jardín de la cultivación; Plantas de los jardines 
de la cultivación, Bio-cultivando un huerto, plantas del rectángulo 
del balcón; Pájaros en el jardín, colocando el alimentador 
del aBird, plantando en el Garde</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">healhty Lebensstil Ausbildung</string>
